channel.title: Green dot bug in manjaro linux
channel.description: Hi I have download latest update for black mesa. now there is graphic issue manjaro kde here is the pic https://drive.google.com/file/d/1rSi0aNiy0gP7fYquhJ9-NYmAdd1IVw52/view?usp=sharing green dot won't disappear

item.title: Green dot bug in manjaro linux
item.dc:creator: soupcan
item.description:
I am also experiencing this issue on Ubuntu 18.04.4. Disabling god rays seems to fix the issue. System information follows.

item.source: Green dot bug in manjaro linux

item.title: Green dot bug in manjaro linux
item.dc:creator: c0de
item.description:
Also on Manjaro Linux and have the same green dot. This was visible on a pre-1.0 version of the game in the levels that Questionable Ethics happen on. They seem to be the green lights behind the alien grunts in that level.

Edit:
I read the how to report an issue and got the information

] status
hostname: Black Mesa
version : 100001/24 100001 insecure
map : bm_c2a4e at: 4862 x, -30 y, -386 z
# 3 “Alopexc0de” STEAM_ID_PENDING 13:06 19 0 active loopback
tags :
players : 1 humans, 0 bots (1 max)
edicts : 1471 used of 4096 max
# userid name uniqueid connected ping loss state adr
] getpos
setpos 4862.172363 -30.892284 -386.968750;setang -10.031998 154.224319 0.000000

Read full topic
